name: NERO: Nothing Ever Remains Obscure - duplicate
summary: NERO takes players on journey in a world of incredible beauty where a kid is the key to all locks and the night is not as frightening as we all could think. This is a next-generation take on the visual novel concept that focuses on a story driven gameplay which is heavily expressed in the game’s overall mechanics. NERO is about love. NERO is about faith. NERO is about feelings. NERO is about questions that need answers. The player will have to decide how to walk along his path: his choices, his feelings, his truth...
